talk011: <sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>Could a big swirly sand circle really exist?
talk012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>WHOA! Look at that big swirly sand circle!
It looks like the sand is swirling toward
the center.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder what would happen if you got
swallowed up by it...<sp:5:0:0> Ohhh, it's
kinda scary!
talk013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Thank you, Mr. Hero! I'm so happy!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is to say a proper thank you. <sp:5:0:0>Take it!
talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Mr. Hero! Thanks for making
Korok Forest normal again!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Do you have a minute, Mr. Hero? I've got
something I'd like to ask you...
talk014:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Do you like carrots? <sp:5:0:0>I was going to keep
them, but I want you to have them,
Mr. Hero!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now I just need it to be peaceful out there
so I can go exploring.

You can do it, Mr. Hero!
talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Angry_01>Really?!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you, Mr. Hero!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You see,<sp:5:0:0> I have a friend who says they
saw a <clr:0000>big<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> whirly circle<clr:ffff>!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkPositive>They saw it in <clr:0000>an area with water<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>If it's
really real, I want to see it myself. Even a
picture would do.
But it's still too dangerous to leave here...<sp:5:0:0>
So please make it safe out there soon,<sp:5:0:0>
Mr. Hero!
talk015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Uh-oh! Your pouch is full. And I was all
set to give you five endura carrots.<sp:0:4:0>Come back when you've got space.
talk003:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Yeah, you seem busy.<sp:5:1:0> When you're less
busy, please come talk to me again!
talk016:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Did you make space in your pouch,
Mr. Hero?
talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>A <clr:0000>big circle that spins<clr:ffff> in the water...<sp:5:0:0>
If it's really real, I want to see it, even
as a picture.
talk017:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Your pouch is still full! How am I supposed
to hand over your five endura carrots?<sp:0:4:0>Come back when you have space in there!
talk018:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Ah, Mr. Hero! Do you have a minute?
I've got something I'd like to ask you.
talk019:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>What! You have an image of whirly water?<sp:5:0:0>
Do you really, Mr. Hero?
talk006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad>What could it be like...<sp:5:0:0>The big
whirly thing...
talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oooh...<sp:5:0:0> So this is it!


<sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's so neat! But...<sp:5:0:0>I feel dizzy from looking
at it...
talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Thank you, Mr. Hero! So there really was
a big whirly thing!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>But, you know that friend of mine? They
told me something else... Something
shocking!
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>They said there's more than just whirly
water circles. There's a <clr:0000>big swirly sand
circle<clr:ffff> too!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Chat_01>Swirly sand!<sp:5:1:0> Could such a thing
really exist?
talk009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>A <clr:0000>big swirly sand circle<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0> If it's really real,
I want to see it!
talk020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>What! You have an image of swirly sand?
<sp:5:0:0>Do you really, Mr. Hero?
talk021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>One of my friends told me there's
someone at Lookout Landing who
made a tool that makes pictures.
If you happened to have that thing, I
wouldn't even need to leave to see the
whirly circle.
talk010:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>You brought it again?! Show me,
show me!
